Events

Find an event near you. Or, let us know if you are planning an event, submit the details or get in touch!

Friday, November 20th

GWU Mapathon

6:00pm - 9:00pm

TEST:

George Mason University

3:30pm - 7:00pm

Come show your Patriot Pride by choosing from various mapping projects to help close data gaps in the mapping community. George Mason University will utilize OpenStreetMap to contribute to disaster preparedness projects around volcanoes in Indonesia. Food and drinks will be provided!

Supporters

Participating Groups

National Geographic
OpenStreetMap US MapGive HOT Missing Maps USAID GeoCenter Kathmandu Living Labs

Interested in participating? Email osmgeoweek@gmail.com to learn more.
